featured.text: The students lost an average of 2.34 kilograms during the past two months, and the student who lost the most, the nine-year-old Howard Chang, shed more than six kilograms.
What do you think the word “shed” means in this passage?
It also can shed new light on why dogs do the things they do.

definition.zh_def: 小屋；棚子，用於儲存工具或其他物品的建築。
definition.en_def: A small building used for storage or shelter.
definition.example: He keeps his gardening tools in the shed.
